Signature, Inscription, and Seals

at R: (After drizzling for scores of days, even the rain gets old. / I envision the flowers in disarray by the river far away. / To soothe my mind, in a small pavilion, I leisurely pick up a brush / and paint some cut branches in the manner of Nanden)
